name: ERC1155MintByOwner
description: ERC1155 - Mint as Owner. Allow minting as contract owner with no restrictions.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: mintByOwner
functionDecorators.description: Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`, of token type `id`. See {ERC1155-_mint}. Requirements: - the caller must be diamond owner.
